item.description:
Ben Stiller manages a high-class apartment building in Manhattan. He and his co-workers lose all their savings in a Ponzi Scheme run by a tenant (Alan Alda). Ben Stiller recruits the other employees to rob Alan Alda in order to get their money back. He also recruits a thief (Eddie Murphy) to help with the robbery.

This looks like an entertaining movie. Let's plan on meeting on Sunday night at Showcase in Worcester. The movie starts at 6:45 PM, so let's meet in the lobby at about 6:15.

We can go out to O'Connor's or 99 for eats after the movie. If you need to reach me, call my cell phone at 508-981-0455.
item.how_to_find_us: I look like my photo, but with a goatee.

group.name: The Worcester Movie Fans Meetup Group

item.name: Tower Heist
